name: Attention Map Consistency
description: Analyzes spatial attention patterns to detect inconsistencies typical of AI-generated images.
algorithm: Self-Attention Consistency Analysis for Synthetic Image Detection
mechanism: AI-generated images often exhibit unnatural attention patterns where different regions show inconsistent levels of detail. This method analyzes local contrast, detail density, and sharpness distribution maps.
parameters: Attention map: gradient-weighted, Scales: 3 (fine/medium/coarse), Consistency: cross-scale correlation
source: Zhao, T. et al. (2023) — Multi-Attentional Deepfake Detection, CVPR
useCase: Detecting AI-generated images by identifying unnatural spatial attention distributions

references.title: Zhao, T. et al. (2023) — Multi-Attentional Deepfake Detection, CVPR

strengths:
• Captures high-level semantic artifacts
• Works across generation methods
• Multi-scale analysis
• Interpretable attention maps
limitations:
• Requires sufficient image complexity
• May struggle with simple scenes
• Attention patterns vary by content
• Training-dependent performance
